description: Humans, an expansionist flexible race with the habit of growing their colonies and territory. They do do specialize in any specific skill and tend to just be pretty good at anything

Dovian, a proud hearty race of tall dragonscaled folk who call the mountains to the southeast thier home. Their skill in Heavy Weapons and Melee Resistance is unrivaled, but their speed is effected by thier bulky form.

Elves, an elegant magical race of people who call many different regions their home. Their magical affinity makes them expert enchanters and their long lifespan allows them to perfect their combat ability, but their lightweight body structure makes them more frail.

Myrdai are a race of sea folk who call the oceans and seas their home. Their ability to breath under water makes them expert swimmers and their aquatic abilities allows them to be perfect fishermen, but their fragile scaled body structure makes them more frail.
